Package com.intellij.openapi.editor

Interface EditorGutter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditorGutterComponentEx

    public interface EditorGutter
    Provides services for drawing custom text annotations in the editor gutter. Such annotations are used, for example, by the "Annotate" feature of version control integrations.
    It's also possible to control the display of line numbers in gutter.
    See Also:
    Editor.getGutter()

        Adds a provider for drawing custom text annotations in the editor gutter, with the possibility to execute an action when the annotation is clicked.
        Parameters:

      • setLineNumberConverter

        default void setLineNumberConverter(LineNumberConverter converter)
        Changes the display of line numbers in gutter. Disables showing additional line numbers.
        See Also:
        setLineNumberConverter(LineNumberConverter, LineNumberConverter)

      • setLineNumberConverter

        void setLineNumberConverter(LineNumberConverter primaryConverter,
                            LineNumberConverter additionalConverter)
        Changes the display of line numbers in gutter
        Parameters:
        primaryConverter - converter for primary line number shown in gutter
        additionalConverter - if not null, defines an additional column of numbers to be displayed in gutter
